feature: Prev/Next buttons update the page canvas

expected: Counter changes to 2 / 9 and canvas redraws for the next dataset
notes: Requires interactive browser session; not executed in container

feature: Keyboard arrow keys navigate between pages
command: Manual: with canvas focused, press ArrowRight
expected: Same state change as clicking Next

expected: Indicator updates to 5 / 9 and monetization slide renders
